name: SLComposeServiceViewController
desc: A view controller that you present from your share app extension, allowing the user to compose social media posts.

items.name: func configurationItems() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns configuration items to display in the compose view.

items.name: class SLComposeSheetConfigurationItem
items.desc: An object that provides additional configuration details to use when configuring a composition interface.

items.name: func reloadConfigurationItems()
items.desc: Reloads the list of configuration items.

items.name: var contentText: String!
items.desc: A string that represents the text which the user entered into the compose view’s text view.

items.name: var placeholder: String!
items.desc: A string that’s displayed in the compose view’s text view when the text view is empty.

items.name: var textView: UITextView!
items.desc: The editable text view in the compose view.

items.name: func pushConfigurationViewController(UIViewController!)
items.desc: Presents a configuration view controller that lets the user configure the post.

items.name: func popConfigurationViewController()
items.desc: Dismisses the current configuration view controller.

items.name: func presentationAnimationDidFinish()
items.desc: Tells the compose view controller that the presentation animation is finished.

items.name: func didSelectCancel()
items.desc: Sent to the compose view after the cancel animation finishes.

items.name: func didSelectPost()
items.desc: Sent to the compose view after the post animation finishes.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Starts the animated dismissal of the compose view.

items.name: var charactersRemaining: NSNumber!
items.desc: The number of characters remaining in a custom character limit.

items.name: func isContentValid() -> Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current content and attachments are valid.

items.name: func validateContent()
items.desc: Performs validation of the current content and updates the state of the Post button, if appropriate.

items.name: func loadPreviewView() -> UIView!
items.desc: Loads a view that displays a preview of the attachments in the extension context.

items.name: var autoCompletionViewController: UIViewController!
items.desc: The view controller that manages an autocompletion view for suggesting common text completions while users type.
